model.name: Camera Model
model.desc: Device used to take this picture.

shutterSpeed.name: Shutter Speed
shutterSpeed.desc: The length of time that the digital sensor inside the camera is exposed to light.

_copyright.name: Copyright
_copyright.desc: Who owns the copyright of this image.

isoValue.name: ISO Value
isoValue.desc: The sensitivity of the camera's image sensor to light.

focalLength.name: FOV
focalLength.desc:
Optical distance from the point where light rays converge to form a sharp image of an object to the digital sensor
(angle of view / magnification).

fNumber.name: Aperture
fNumber.desc: Opening in a lens through which light passes to enter the camera.

title.name: Title
title.desc: Some people like to title their photos.

author.name: Author
author.desc: Who took care of this picture.
